asana.name: Ardhakati Chakrasana
asana.desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit

00:01.desc: Feet together; hands on the side of your thighs;

00:05.desc: Inhale, Raise the left arm sideways up stretch it to the sky

00:09.desc: Exhale, Bend your body to the right side

00:37.desc: Inhale, Stand up stretch your left hand to the sky

00:41.desc: Exhale, Bring the left hand sideways down keep it on the thigh

00:45.desc: Inhale, Raise the right arm sideways up stretch it to the sky

00:49.desc: Exhale, Bend your body to the left side

01:17.desc: Inhale, Stand up stretch your right hand to the sky

01:21.desc: Exhale, Bring the right hand sideways down keep it on the thigh

asana.name: Veerabadrasana Level 2
asana.desc: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit

00:00.desc: Feet together; hands on the side of your thighs;

00:03.desc: Inhale, Right leg out four feet catch your waist

00:07.desc: Exhale, Turn your right foot out look over the right shoulder

00:11.desc: Inhale, Open the arms parallel to mat line of the legs

00:15.desc: Exhale, Bend the right knee, stay there

00:48.desc: Exhale, Turn the right foot in look forward

00:51.desc: Inhale, Turn your left foot out look at your left hand

00:55.desc: Exhale, Bend the left knee, stay there

01:23.desc: Inhale, Straighten the left knee look at the left hand

01:27.desc: Exhale, Turn the left foot in look forward

01:31.desc: Inhale, Catch your waist bring the right leg in one foot

01:36.desc: Exhale, Walk to the left keep your hands down

01:39.desc: Keep your feet apart hands loose
